TEXT.S: Bucky Bockhorn sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1933, ryax sa tay 8 nqu tay 7, Bucky Bockhorn, squliq na p'unro. qnxan nya Bockhorn mrkyas beh Illinois.raral ga mqwas beh Trico pqwasan biru. Bockhorn masoq kunlan lga NBA mhngaw ru ini pcizyaw. hiya ga ru bes nya(Peggy)maki Dayton.
